item.description:
2nd annual Farm Fest to benefit the animals of Maple Farm Sanctuary

Enjoy delicious vegan food and live music too!

There will be lots of fun, family friendly activities like kid's crafts and games, face painting, raffles, yoga, massage, reiki and MORE.

A $5 per person donation will support the work of MFS to rescue abused and abandoned farm animals while promoting compassion for all living beings.

Children under 12 FREE!

All you need to bring is your great, positive energy and a willingness to have a blast!

More info on the blog! http://mfsfarmfest.wordpress.com/

This is an (informal meetup) meaning that we won't necessarily be meeting up and all sitting together in formal meetup fashion, but you are invited to attend with friends and family between 12-4pm. If you'd like to formally meet up, VegWorcester is hosting a bike ride to the event, and the meetup event page for that is here: http://www.meetup.com/vegan-365/events/68201322/

There is a Facebook Event for this here: https://www.facebook.com/events/402014009816942/

Â
item.name: Maple Farm Sanctuary's FARM FEST
